data.text: A lovely hotel by the sea with beautiful views of Naama Bay. Good service and food, lots of fruits and vegetables and a favorite Japanese restaurant in the main building. I would like to mention the animators separately, it has always been fun, interesting, there are many programs to choose from: yoga, stretching and others. Daily trips to night parties accompanied and delivered, everything is organized, fun and safe.
data.title: Vocation March 2024

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest,
It has been a pleasure to host you and we love to hear that you had a good vacation with us. The staff is there to make you feel comfortable and we are so pleased to note that you appreciated their efforts.
Thank you for taking the time to write this review and we look forward to welcoming you back again in the near future.
Sunny regards Naama Bay Promenade Beach Resort Team.
owner_response.author: Anna Sinitsina

data.text:
Was a bit sceptic about going Egypit as read and heard mixed reviews. Arrived pretty late at hotel and was welcomed by staff at reception. He accommodated us really fast so that we could grab a few drinks before closing. Soup and fresh bread was available as kitchen was already closed. From there it only got better.
Food was freshly made every day with good variety. Water  juice and coffee stations all around hotel. Hotel looks absolutely amazing so does the pool area. Never a shortage of sun lounges. Towels issued each day.
Staff at the bar were outstanding and couldn't be more friendly or helpful!
Entertainment team were always available and checking on us.
Very close to airport and in middle of town centre.
Guys at shops also deserve a credit.
Not once have we been asked for any tips and even if wanted to give some they wouldn't take.
At time it felt that staff at bar were watched by supervisor (blue shirts) which made us feel a bit uncomfortable. They wouldn't speak to any guest just watch what everyone was doing. 
Overall great experience and would recommend.
data.title: Great experience

data.text:
Right 
I will start with the description 5 stars üåü hotel 
( I‚Äôm sorry, but for the rooms conditions and hotel conditions it‚Äôs 3 stars üåü hotel. old rooms, old bathrooms, the tiles are moving on the floor) 
Food: needs to improve a little, try to change the food..not all days ( almost )the same food ( more types of food ) ( from 1 to 10 = 6
Sweats and cakes: big improvement is required ( from 1 to 10 = 4 )
Food service personal: satisfied, respectful personal ( from 1 to 10 = 8 )
Bar service personal beach side: Needs to improve in service and how to talk with the customer ( from 1 to 10 = 4 )
Team leaders, the guys in the blue shirt that all the time are going around the hotel and staying at the beach bar :: I don‚Äôt know how and who gave you the jobs there guys, but definitely you doing the job very bad and wrong 
You guys are the image of the hotel, in my opinion: smile a little, talk with the customer, make them feel welcome, ask them how things are going, how they are  feling( I saw only bad attitude from their side)
I remember a lady came to the bar beach, obviously the lady ben a little drunk..and she asked for a small drink ( that told guy team leader in the blue shirt told her like this : The woman should not be drinking)
Honestly like customer a big NO NO NO..very bad attitude from the team leader 
Never in my life I saw so bad management
Team leadership ( the guys in the blue shirt üëî seating all the time next to the beach bar) from 1 to 10 = 0 

Tips money for the workers: in my opinion let the workers getting tips from the costumer, that‚Äôs how we showing our gratitude to the service that we receiving. 

For ending the feedback 
For the owner of the hotel, you need to improve some things..and in my opinion start with the team leaders ( the guys in the blue shirts üëî the guys that are seating all day next to the beach bar ) 
That guys are the image and the face of your business, and believe me is not good at all.

Have great day ü§ù
data.title: Poor

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you for your valuable time sharing your experience. For us is very important to know how our valuable guest spend their holiday with us.
The Management of the Resort is taking to the consideration each single guest recommendation.
According to your evaluation ratings we could see that not all services have been provided by high level.
We apologize for not meeting your vacation expectations in some of service of the Resort. 
We will make action with according to your comments to avoid this in future. Once again we would like to thank you for sharing your vacation experience with us and for your valuable comments
With best regards, Team of Naama Bay Promenade Beach Resort.
owner_response.author: Anna Sinitsina

data.text:
We had a great stay, and will be back‚Ä¶ that‚Äôs for sure! 

Lovely food, nice rooms and the most fantastic staff. So kind and helpfull.
The hotel is very clean everywhere.
Beach is awesome
Entertainment in the evening is very good - funny for both kids and adults.

All my best recommendations to this hotel!

data.text:
Scraping a 4* rating!! Stayed beach side, better than mountain side but still needs a load of money throwing at this place as it‚Äôs very tired looking! 
Not much on offer for all inclusive, with the food being nice but very repetitive all week. Didn‚Äôt even bother having the local cheap booze‚Ä¶‚Ä¶
Room was spacious and clean but run down. 
The best part by far are the super friendly staff who made us feel very welcome, loving the fact we were English as it‚Äôs 90% Russian. 
We had a great week for the price we paid!!!
data.title: Scraping 4*
